nodes.bodyText: If I call decodeJWTPayload it will try to decode all the time. But in this case, it will only decode if the token is not there in cache.
this payload should be retrieved from "invocationContext[PRINCIPAL][ISSUER_CLAIMS]" to support claim mapping. Change in the line 231. See issue - #1342 (comment)
Remove the issuer ballerina doc parameter. This gives a warning when building the mgw project.
